responses: Hello! Ask me about this portfolio FAQ chatbot project.
Hi! I can answer common questions about the project setup and usage.
Привет! Я могу ответить на вопросы про этот FAQ-чатбот проект.
This is a beginner NLP FAQ chatbot that retrieves the best answer using TF-IDF similarity.
The project demonstrates a simple retrieval-based chatbot pipeline for portfolio use.
Use the training script to build and save TF-IDF artifacts in the models folder.
After training, launch chat mode and type your questions.
Core stack: scikit-learn, numpy, joblib, and simple custom preprocessing.
Optional visualization uses wordcloud and matplotlib.
